title: Maali Pon Maalai Lyics Udhayam NH4 Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Movie: Udhayam NH4
Singer: Bela Shende & S.P.Charan
Music: GV Prakash Kumar
Lyrics: La. Rajkumar
Other Songs Lyrics
Ora Kannala
Yaaro Ivan
Maalai Pon Maalai
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words

Maali Pon Maalai 
Naam pogindra saalaiyellaam
Magaradham vaan thoovudhey (2)

Madimeedhu unnai vaithu
maarbodu annaipeney
imai moodum iraviniley adiyee

paal veedhi payanamvali
nam thedal nadakudhadi
vinmeengal velichathiley adiye

Nadhimeedhiniley pala kodinilaa
oh neelkirahey kanave

Maali Pon Maalai
Naam pogindra saalaiyellaam
Magaradham vaan thoovudhey

Thozhiley saayum uyarathil
nee irupathu poruthamey
Udhatiley udhadu urasum podhu
uyiriley azhuthamey

Ulnaakiley thaen thuli nee
Un thozhiley kodi malli naan
Sottu sottaai mazhai thuli nee
vettu veli ottrai poo naan

En jannal vaaniley
satendru thirakudhey
.. naduviley
mottondru malarudhey

Maali Pon Maalai
Naam pogindra saalaiyellaam
Magaradham vaan thoovudhey

Oh vialgalil thavalum kopaiyil
nirambum vilayilaa wine ival
Iruliley eriyum meuginai pola
azhagiya oli ival

Kannam serthu kaigal korthu
vatta nilaa vaanam paarthu
ondraagudhey kangal naangu
ottrai kanaa kaanum podhu

Oru poorvai koodathil
nam serndhey vasikalaam
siru vervai pookayil
malar thottam vidhaikalaam

Maali Pon Maalai
Naam pogindra saalaiyellaam
Magaradham vaan thoovudhey

Maali Pon Maalai
Naam pogindra saalaiyellaam
Magaradham vaan thoovudhey (2)

Madimeedhu unnai vaithu
maarbodu annaipeney
imai moodum iraviniley adiyee

paal veedhi payanamvali
nam thedal nadakudhadi
vinmeengal velichathiley adiye

Nadhimeedhiniley pala kodinilaa
oh neelkirahey kanave

Maali Pon Maalai
Naam pogindra saalaiyellaam
Magaradham vaan thoovudhey

English Translation
I tried my best :)
